samba 1.0.1

Reference

All functions

add_pred_to_pro()

Add prediction mean to professional network dataset

boxplot_per_hour()

Plot residuals boxplot per hour from reference network

boxplot_per_station()

Plot residuals boxplot per station from reference network

check_area_shp()

Check area shapefile format

check_cws_raw()

Check raw cws format

check_elev()

Check elevation format

check_era5_accum()

Check era5 accumulated format

check_era5_instant()

Check era5 instantaneous format

check_fch()

Check forest canopy height format

check_imp()

Check imperviousness format

check_input()

Check input list format

check_ts_te()

Check time start and time end format

create_empty_grids()

Create 100km*100km grids inside US cells provided by their id

create_st_grids_from_cells()

Create monthly 100km*100km grids inside US cells

density_beta_covar()

Plot density for spatial covariate coefficients from the BHM

extract_building_footprint()

Extracts building footprint at spatial points

extract_elevation()

Extracts elevation at spatial points

extract_era5()

Extracts era5 covariates

extract_evapotranspiration()

Extracts evapotranspiration at spatial points

extract_forest_canopy_height()

Extracts forest canopy height at spatial points

extract_imperviousness()

Extracts imperviousness at spatial points

extract_local_climate_zone()

Extracts local climate zone at spatial points

extract_tree_canopy_cover()

Extracts tree canopy cover at spatial points

find_cells()

Find cells id in a polygon

inference()

Spatiotemporal model inference with INLA

inflate()

Inflate the prediction grid raster to a spatiotemporal SpatVector

load_palette()

Load palettes

map_pred_mean()

Plot maps of the Bayesian model prediction mean

map_pred_with_pro()

Map prediction mean with professional measurements for a given time

map_rmse()

Calculate and plot RMSE map This function calculates the root mean square error (RMSE) for each station in the pro dataset and plots it on a map with imperviousness background

map_rmse_nlcd()

Calculate and plot RMSE map with NLCD background This function calculates the root mean square error (RMSE) for each station in the pro dataset and plots it on a map with National Land Cover Dataset background

map_uhi()

Map urban heat island

map_uhi_obs()

Map urban heat island with point observations

median_bias_per_hour()

Plot median residuals per hour

mytile()

Generic function to create meteorological tile plot on one month

mytile_rain()

Rain tile plot on one month

plot_windrose()

Plot wind rose.

prepare_bhm_materials()

Prepare samba Bayesian Hierarchical model materials.

process_bf()

Process building footprint raster

process_elev()

Process elevation raster

process_fch()

Process forest canopy height raster

process_imp()

Process imperviousness raster

process_lcz()

Process local climate zone raster

process_tcc()

Process tree canopy cover raster

rasterize_pred()

Convert prediction data frame to terra::SpatRaster

samba()

Run the whole samba analysis.

sf_as_spatraster()

Convert an sf to a SpatRaster

store_post_info()

Store marginal posterior statistics Store marginal posterior statistics

timeseries_res()

Plot residual timeseries

timeseries_temp()

Plot temperature timeseries
